reviewText: Hello, I have purchased the ,"STAFF 2-DVD bundle" with ASIN# B01MZ05MLG, "Beginner Tai Chi bundle" with ASIN# B00N40ZFOO, and "Tai Chi Martial Applications bundle" with ASIN# B01LYJMX4J. I chose the YMAA website as a reference for my selections, as it is organized well and sufficiently details each product. I have yet to watch the entirety of the 6 DVDs and 3 books, though from briefly glancing through the books and DVDs and initiating my study with the "Tai Chi Qigong" book and DVD, I notice consistency throughout Dr. Yang's material. Dr. Yang's material is detailed and organized. The book's illustrations host direction arrows and brief expository captions. Dr. Yang speaks clearly with a distinct Chinese accent. The DVDs host useful captions when Dr. Yang speaks providing clarity while adapting to a Chinese accent. I have spent approximately $150 for these three bundles and consider this a worthy investment as Dr. Yang's material is concise and professionally published. This is a cumulative review encompassing all three bundles. Thank you, Satisfied Amazon and YMAA Customer Beginner Tai Chi Bundle: STAFF 2-DVD bundle - Staff Fundamentals DVD and Shaolin Staff Sequence (YMAA) Dr. Yang, Jwing-Ming Bundle: Tai Chi Martial Applications book & DVD by Dr. Yang, Jwing-Ming **Bestseller**

Most amazing rewarding I ever made.  The DVD is sp clear easy to follow and loaded with good info from head to start.  Has given my life whole new meaning.  I am recommending to anyone who will listen.  Have had less than month several medical issues have improved.
The books are poor printing quality. It looks like photo copy!
Excelled Tai chi step by step
Looks like a comprehensive set of introductory books and DVDs.

Dr Yang is truly a Tai Chi Chuan and Qi Gong master.  I've practiced with several other Masters; yet, I've found his teaching method and videography very helpful in understanding position and movement.
Great package everything you need to start tai chi. And bring you to intermediate level martial artist.
